data.client_settings: Android alpha 6.1.9, also on an unknown version of android stable
data.actual_result: The two lines will be treated as being in the same hour slot and no new timestamp will be shown for the second line
data.expected_result: The first line should have a timestamp and the second line should have a separate timestamp as they are said in separate hour slots
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter an emoji (nothing else) and tap enter - 1+ hours later, type some text and tap enter again
